name: Bokchoy Shitake Veggies
description: Delight in the healthy and flavorful Bokchoy Shitake Veggies recipe, perfect for those seeking a nutritious yet delicious meal. With low-carb and low-sugar ingredients, this dish fits splendidly into health-conscious diets.

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the Chinese Bokchoy under cold water and chop into bite-sized pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Peel the carrot and slice it into thin circles.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the young baby corn into small rounds.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the Shitake mushrooms into thin pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Finely chop the red onion and mince the garlic cloves.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan over medium heat, add the mushrooms, onions, and garlic. Saut√© for 5 minutes until softened.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Add the bokchoy, carrot, and baby corn to the pan. Stir in the salt and black pepper. Cook for an additional 8 minutes, until the vegetables are tender but still crisp.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7
